title: Agenda setting function of the media

content.question: The agenda-setting function of the media refers to the power to

choices.label: endorse specific candidates for political office
favor the position of one interest group over another
counter the censorship activities of media watch groups
mobilize economic interests in favor of a particular candidate
decide which issues are important enough to bring to public attention

content.answer: decide which issues are important enough to bring to public attention

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
